channel.title: RuneLifex 718 rsps|vorago|dicing|customs|24/7 vps
channel.description:
[SIZE=4]HEY guys welcome to my Server! We at Runelifex try our best to have a healthy community with many players! We Push updates every few days based off of requests! Runelifex has been a work in progress for the last 3 months! [/SIZE] - All 24 Skills are Trainable - Farming works - Tree Farming Falador - Construction - Other training places. - Worked out Location System - Random Event system - Trivia -Lost City Quest - Balmung works! - Sunfreet and Pest Queen - 2 Quests - Dwarf Cannon - RuneSpan - Zombies! - Bank Tabs - Customs - Ganodermic Beasts - cluescrolls - Lodestones!!!! -Worldwide skilling (And a member skill island) -Active Pking all around the server -Plenty of bosses in wilderness and non wilderness -Castle Wars -Double Xp weekends -Fight pits for fun dueling -Safe Pk -Fully working customs -Blink -Yk'Lagor the Thunderous -Vorago (Removed temp) -Seatroll queen! -Offhand Drygores and mainhand -drygores have special attacks [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2ll2ja9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2h7j9n9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2zsd8r6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/v2zkzk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2rpd9oh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2zi6fl2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/t9xxn4.png[/img] (More pictures to be added with updates!)
